description.zh-cn: 1951年至1952年间，由毛泽东等中国共产党高层在中华人民共和国开展的两场以“反腐败”、“反贪污”等为名义的政治运动。
description.en: A series of political campaigns launched by Mao Zedong and the top leadership of the Communist Party of China in the People's Republic of China between 1951 and 1952, under the slogans of "anti-corruption" and "anti-embezzlement".

description.zh-cn: 一场针对中国共产党内部、国家机关及事业单位的“反贪污、反浪费、反官僚主义”的政治运动。
description.en: A political campaign targeting corruption, waste, and bureaucracy within the Communist Party of China, government agencies, and public institutions.

description.zh-cn: 一场针对私人工商业阶层的“反行贿、反偷税漏税、反偷工减料、反盗骗国家财产、反盗窃国家经济情报”的政治运动。
description.en: A political campaign targeting the private industrial and commercial sector against bribery, tax evasion, theft of state property, cheating on government contracts, and stealing state economic information.

description.zh-cn: 1963年由中共中央发起的，与四清运动并行的政治运动，内容为反对贪污盗窃、反对投机倒把、反对铺张浪费、反对分散主义、反对官僚主义。
description.en: A political campaign launched by the CPC Central Committee in 1963, parallel to the Four Cleanups Movement, targeting embezzlement and theft, speculation, extravagance and waste, decentralism, and bureaucracy.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人，发动了三反五反运动。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who launched the Three-anti and Five-anti campaigns.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 三反五反运动发生的国家。
description.en: The country where the Three-anti and Five-anti campaigns took place.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心人物。在三反五反运动期间发现问题并向中央报告。
description.en: The core figure of the second generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China. He identified problems during the Three-anti and Five-anti campaigns and reported them to the Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一任国务院总理，批准结束三反五反运动。
description.en: The first Premier of the People's Republic of China, who approved the conclusion of the Three-anti and Five-anti campaigns.

description.zh-cn: 在五反运动中成为主要打击对象的社会阶层。
description.en: The social class that became the main target of the Five-anti campaign.

zh-cn: 生产资料所有制的社会主义改造

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1953年至1956年对生产资料所有制进行的社会主义转型。
description.en: The socialist transformation of the ownership of the means of production conducted by the Communist Party of China from 1953 to 1956.

description.zh-cn: 由国家拥有和经营的经济部门，三反五反运动巩固了其领导地位。
description.en: The economic sector owned and operated by the state, whose leading position was consolidated by the Three-anti and Five-anti campaigns.

description.zh-cn: 中国华北地区的一座主要城市，其经济在三反五反运动中受到冲击。
description.en: A major city in Northern China whose economy was impacted during the Three-anti and Five-anti campaigns.

description.zh-cn: 中国西南地区的一座主要城市，其经济在三反五反运动中受到冲击。
description.en: A major city in Southwest China whose economy was impacted during the Three-anti and Five-anti campaigns.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一座主要城市，是五反运动的主要进行地，经济受到严重冲击。
description.en: A major city in China, which was a primary site for the Five-anti campaign and where the economy was severely impacted.

description.zh-cn: 指在司法或政治运动中错误处理的案件。三反五反运动中出现了大量此类案件。
description.en: Refers to unjust, false, and wrongly decided cases in judicial or political movements. A large number of such cases occurred during the Three-anti and Five-anti campaigns.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平的连襟，在三反运动中被错误批判后自杀。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's brother-in-law, who committed suicide after being wrongly criticized during the Three-anti campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国航运企业家，在三反五反运动中被迫害自杀。
description.en: Chinese shipping entrepreneur who was persecuted and committed suicide during the Three-anti and Five-anti campaigns.

description.zh-cn: 冠生园创始人，在五反运动中被迫害跳楼自杀。
description.en: Founder of Guan Sheng Yuan, who was persecuted and committed suicide by jumping from a building during the Five-anti campaign.

description.zh-cn: 由冼冠生创办的著名食品企业。
description.en: A famous food company founded by Xian Guansheng.

description.zh-cn: 原中共天津地委书记，因在三反运动中被揭发严重贪污，与张子善一同被处决。
description.en: Former secretary of the Tianjin Prefectural Committee of the CPC, who was executed along with Zhang Zishan for serious corruption exposed during the Three-anti campaign.

description.zh-cn: 原天津地区专员，因在三反运动中被揭发严重贪污，与刘青山一同被处决。
description.en: Former commissioner of the Tianjin region, who was executed along with Liu Qingshan for serious corruption exposed during the Three-anti campaign.

description.zh-cn: 三反运动期间揭露的中共高级干部刘青山、张子善的重大贪污案件。
description.en: A major corruption case involving senior CPC cadres Liu Qingshan and Zhang Zishan, exposed during the Three-anti campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代女作家。在目睹三反五反等政治运动后，于1952年移居香港。
description.en: A modern Chinese female writer. After witnessing political campaigns such as the Three-anti and Five-anti movements, she moved to Hong Kong in 1952.

description.zh-cn: 1951年在中国大陆开展的针对电影《武训传》的政治批判运动，是影响张爱玲决定离开大陆的事件之一。
description.en: A political criticism campaign against the film 'The Life of Wu Xun' in mainland China in 1951, which was one of the events that influenced Eileen Chang's decision to leave the mainland.

description.zh-cn: 张爱玲和陈光甫在离开中国大陆后前往的地区。
description.en: The region where Eileen Chang and K. P. Chen went after leaving mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 中国剧作家、社会活动家，曾试图挽留张爱玲留在中国大陆。
description.en: Chinese playwright and social activist who attempted to persuade Eileen Chang to stay in mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 民盟中央副主席，因建议审查三反五反等运动中的失误，在反右运动中被划为右派。
description.en: Vice Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Democratic League, who was labeled a rightist during the Anti-Rightist Campaign for proposing a review of the mistakes in campaigns like the Three-anti and Five-anti movements.

description.zh-cn: 1957年在中国大陆由中共发动的一场政治运动，罗隆基在此运动中受到迫害。
description.en: A political campaign launched by the CPC in mainland China in 1957, during which Luo Longji was persecuted.

description.zh-cn: 上海商业储蓄银行的创办者，在三反五反运动后拒绝返回大陆，定居台湾。
description.en: Founder of the Shanghai Commercial and Savings Bank, who refused to return to the mainland after the Three-anti and Five-anti campaigns and settled in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 中国经济学家、会计学家，在三反运动中受到处分。
description.en: Chinese economist and accountant who was punished during the Three-anti campaign.

description.zh-cn: 1963年至1966年在中国农村逐步推开的社会主义教育运动，与第二次五反运动并行。
description.en: A socialist education movement gradually rolled out in rural China from 1963 to 1966, which ran parallel to the second Five-anti campaign.

description.zh-cn: 时任上海副市长，在上海做了五反运动的动员报告。
description.en: Then Deputy Mayor of Shanghai, who delivered a mobilization speech for the Five-anti campaign in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东等中国共产党高层发动了三反五反运动。
description.en: Mao Zedong and other senior leaders of the Communist Party of China launched the Three-anti and Five-anti campaigns.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党发动了三反五反运动，以“反腐败”、“反贪污”为名义。
description.en: The Communist Party of China launched the Three-anti and Five-anti campaigns under the slogans of "anti-corruption" and "anti-embezzlement".

description.zh-cn: 经毛泽东批准，三反五反运动于1952年10月结束。
description.en: With Mao Zedong's approval, the Three-anti and Five-anti campaigns ended in October 1952.

description.zh-cn: 经周恩来批准，三反五反运动于1952年10月结束。
description.en: With Zhou Enlai's approval, the Three-anti and Five-anti campaigns ended in October 1952.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平发现运动中的问题并向中共中央报告，促成了运动的结束。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping discovered problems in the campaign and reported them to the CPC Central Committee, contributing to its conclusion.

description.zh-cn: 三反五反运动为对资本主义工商业和资产阶级进一步的社会主义改造创造了有利条件。
description.en: The Three-anti and Five-anti campaigns created favorable conditions for the further socialist transformation of capitalist industry and commerce and the bourgeoisie.

description.zh-cn: 三反五反运动确立并巩固了社会主义国营经济在国民经济中的领导地位。
description.en: The Three-anti and Five-anti campaigns established and consolidated the leading position of the socialist state-owned economy in the national economy.

description.zh-cn: 五反运动的主要目标是国内的资产阶级，导致中国大陆资产阶级走向消亡。
description.en: The main target of the Five-anti campaign was the domestic bourgeoisie, leading to the demise of the bourgeoisie in mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 三反五反运动造成了诸多冤假错案。
description.en: The Three-anti and Five-anti campaigns resulted in numerous unjust, false, and wrongly decided cases.

description.zh-cn: 运动对天津的经济造成冲击，导致商业批发、运输、生产和税收均大幅下降。
description.en: The campaign impacted Tianjin's economy, causing significant declines in commercial wholesale, transportation, production, and tax revenue.

description.zh-cn: 运动对重庆的经济造成冲击，导致工厂商店歇业停工，工人大量失业。
description.en: The campaign impacted Chongqing's economy, causing factories and shops to close down and leading to mass unemployment.

description.zh-cn: 运动对上海的经济造成冲击，失业工人增至十三万人，并导致大量资本家和商人自杀。
description.en: The campaign impacted Shanghai's economy, increasing the number of unemployed workers to 130,000 and causing many capitalists and merchants to commit suicide.

description.zh-cn: 乐少华在三反运动中被错误批判，于1952年1月15日自杀身亡。
description.en: Le Shaohua was wrongly criticized during the Three-anti campaign and committed suicide on January 15, 1952.

description.zh-cn: 乐少华是邓小平的连襟。
description.en: Le Shaohua was Deng Xiaoping's brother-in-law (husband of his wife's sister).

description.zh-cn: 中国航运大王卢作孚在运动中被迫害，于1952年2月8日自杀。
description.en: Chinese shipping magnate Lu Zuofu was persecuted during the campaign and committed suicide on February 8, 1952.

description.zh-cn: 冠生园创始人冼冠生在运动中被迫害，于1952年4月21日跳楼自杀。
description.en: Guan Sheng Yuan founder Xian Guansheng was persecuted during the campaign and committed suicide by jumping from a building on April 21, 1952.

description.zh-cn: 冼冠生是冠生园的创始人。
description.en: Xian Guansheng was the founder of Guan Sheng Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 刘青山、张子善因严重贪污被处决，该案成为三反运动高潮的标志。
description.en: The execution of Liu Qingshan and Zhang Zishan for serious corruption marked the climax of the Three-anti campaign.

description.zh-cn: 刘青山的死刑由毛泽东最终拍板决定。
description.en: The death sentence for Liu Qingshan was ultimately decided by Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 张子善的死刑由毛泽东最终拍板决定。
description.en: The death sentence for Zhang Zishan was ultimately decided by Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 目睹三反五反运动后，张爱玲于1952年7月决定移居香港。
description.en: After witnessing the Three-anti and Five-anti campaigns, Eileen Chang decided to move to Hong Kong in July 1952.

description.zh-cn: 1951年的武训传批判运动是促使张爱玲决定离开中国大陆的事件之一。
description.en: The 1951 criticism campaign against 'The Life of Wu Xun' was one of the events that prompted Eileen Chang to leave mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 夏衍曾试图挽留张爱玲留在中国大陆，但张爱玲拒绝了。
description.en: Xia Yan attempted to persuade Eileen Chang to stay in mainland China, but she refused.

description.zh-cn: 三反五反运动使银行家陈光甫明确拒绝返回中国大陆的邀请。
description.en: The Three-anti and Five-anti campaigns led banker K. P. Chen to definitively refuse an invitation to return to mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 经济学家顾准在三反运动中受到了撤销党内外一切职务的处分。
description.en: Economist Gu Zhun was punished during the Three-anti campaign by being removed from all his positions both inside and outside the Party.

description.zh-cn: 1963年发动的第二次“五反运动”与“四清运动”并行开展。
description.en: The second "Five-anti campaign" launched in 1963 was carried out in parallel with the "Four Cleanups Movement".

description.zh-cn: 时任上海副市长潘汉年于1952年2月5日做五反运动动员报告，推动了运动在上海的开展。
description.en: On February 5, 1952, then Deputy Mayor of Shanghai Pan Hannian delivered a mobilization report for the Five-anti campaign, promoting its development in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 罗隆基在1957年建议成立委员会，检查“三反”、“五反”等运动中的失误偏差。
description.en: In 1957, Luo Longji proposed the establishment of a committee to examine the errors and deviations in campaigns such as the "Three-anti" and "Five-anti" movements.

description.zh-cn: 罗隆基关于成立平反委员会的主张遭到了中共高层的批判。
description.en: Luo Longji's proposal to establish a rehabilitation committee was criticized by the senior leadership of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 罗隆基在反右运动中被划为右派。
description.en: Luo Longji was labeled a rightist during the Anti-Rightist Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 罗隆基被毛泽东划为右派。
description.en: Luo Longji was labeled a rightist by Mao Zedong.
